product_name: Nite Ize Figure 9 Rope Tightener - Single Small
long_description: . This Figure 9 rope tightener keeps guylines tight without knots. Rig tarps, clotheslines, guylines, roof-rack tie-downs, even bear bags. Made from lightweight aluminum. Fits braided rope 1/16 in. (2mm) - 3/16 in. (5mm). Instructions are laser-etched on the side. Load limit: 50 pounds.
short_description: Backpacker magazine, April 2007, said, ''This tiny piece of aluminum makes tightening a line a knot- and curse-free task.'' It is offered here in a small size.
